sect2.title: Command explanations
sect2.para: --sysconfdir=/etc: This switch puts the configuration files in /etc/scrollkeeper.
--localstatedir=/var: This switch puts ScrollKeeper's database directory in /var/lib/scrollkeeper.
--disable-static: This switch prevents the static library from being built.
--omfdirs=/usr/share/omf:/opt/kde-&kde-version;/share/omf:/opt/gnome-&gnome-version;/share/omf: This switch sets all the locations for OMF files for scrollkeeper.
